mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cusname AS "cusname", a.goods AS "goods", a.price AS "price", a.goodsnum AS "goodsnum", a.sumprice AS "sumprice", a.date AS "date"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_order( id, cusname, goods, price, goodsnum, sumprice, date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{cusname}, #{goods}, #{price}, #{goodsnum}, #{sumprice}, #{date} )
mapper.update: UPDATE customer_order SET cusname = #{cusname}, goods = #{goods}, price = #{price}, goodsnum = #{goodsnum}, sumprice = #{sumprice}, date = #{date} WHERE id = #{id}
